tag.description: The liferay-ui:ice-check-tool-bar provides command links such as "Check All", "Uncheck All", and "Delete" that are designed to be used in conjunction with an ice:dataTable component.

attribute.description: Corresponds to the value of an id attribute for an ice:dataTable tag.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: This is an HTML pass-thru type of attribute.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: The liferay-ui:ice-info-data-paginator encapsulates an ICEfaces ice:dataPaginator tag that renders pagination information for an associated ice:dataTable. The navigation information will match the internationalized Liferay "showing-x-x-of-x-results" message.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Corresponds to the value of an id attribute for an ice:dataTable tag.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: This is an HTML pass-thru type of attribute.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: The liferay-ui:ice-info-data-paginator encapsulates an ICEfaces ice:dataPaginator tag that renders navigation controls for an associated ice:dataTable. The icons will match the current Liferay theme.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the "Fast Forward" button/icon is rendered. The default value is "false".
attribute.name: fastForwardIconRendered

attribute.description: The label that will appear on the "fast forward" button/icon.
attribute.name: fastForwardLabel

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the "Fast Rewind" button/icon is rendered. The default value is "false".
attribute.name: fastRewindIconRendered

attribute.description: The label that will appear on the "fast rewind" button/icon.
attribute.name: fastRewindLabel

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the "First" button/icon is rendered. The default value is "true".
attribute.name: firstIconRendered

attribute.description: The label that will appear on the "first" button/icon.
attribute.name: firstLabel

attribute.description: Corresponds to the value of an id attribute for an ice:dataTable tag.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the "Last" button/icon is rendered. The default value is "true".
attribute.name: lastIconRendered

attribute.description: The label that will appear on the "last" button/icon.
attribute.name: lastLabel

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the "Next" button/icon is rendered. The default value is "true".
attribute.name: nextIconRendered

attribute.description: The label that will appear on the "next" button/icon.
attribute.name: nextLabel

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the page number links will be rendered. This is a pass-through attribute for the encapsulated ice:dataPaginator. The default value is "true".
attribute.name: paginator

attribute.description: The maximum amount of pages to be displayed in the paginator. This is a pass-through attribute for the encapsulated ice:dataPaginator. The default value is 7.
attribute.name: paginatorMaxPages

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the "Previous" button/icon is rendered. The default value is "true".
attribute.name: previousIconRendered

attribute.description: The label that will appear on the "previous" button/icon.
attribute.name: previousLabel

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: This is an HTML pass-thru type of attribute.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass
